page.title: 13Recreation Swinderdy W.I.
page.content: Swinderby Womens Institute was formed in 1920.It is affiliated to the Lincolnshire North Federation of W.I.s.The group meet each month in the village hall.The meetings take the form of business,speaker and then refreshments.A monthly competition is held the winner receiving points towards the annual prize,a Rose Bowl. In 1985 the membership stands at twenty eight.An annual subscription of Â£4 is payable.There is an annual outing and a birthday party in November.Within the main body is a drama group which performs twice yearly,again in the village hall.Each Christmas the group sing Carols around the village to raise money fo a chosen charity.
